name: That's It?
description:
Prepare for the most epic battle of the summer! Survive the heat and be the last man standing to achieve the coolest prize!

Submitted as an entry for the JDE Midsummer Jam 2020!

Made by the following people:

Click on their names to learn more about them!!

Matt Lopez: Designer, Art, Sound and Music

Alec Chall: UI and Programmer

Vince Vallos: Art and Narrative

Jonathan Russell: Art 

Thank you for downloading and playing! We appreciate it!!
